data.title: BOB GUINEY, 41 SEASON 4, 2003
data.text:
“Being on The Bachelor was a blast, and I made some lifelong friendships out of being a part of it,” Bob tells Star. Though he called it quits with Estelle Gardinier a month after giving her a promise ring on the show and was divorced from actress Rebecca Budig in 2010 after six years of marriage (in what may have been the most amicable split in Hollywood history), Bob is optimistic. “Someday I would love to get married again and have babies,” he says. “It’s definitely something I would love to share with someone.” He adds, “I’m dating and having fun — but nothing too serious right now.” That’s understandable, given his busy schedule. Now living in the L.A. area, Bob performs with Band From TV, a group of actors who…
